definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Constitution is the national fundamental law, with supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 憲法是國家的根本法，具有至高無上的地位。

sentences.english: But as a private individual, I just ignore such people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果我是作爲個人，對這種人我就根本不予理睬。

sentences.english: To change this from the root, the government is duty-bound.
sentences.chinese: 從根本上改變這一狀況，政府責無旁貸。

sentences.english: For man is man or master of his fate.
sentences.chinese: 人根本那是人，是自己命運的主人。

sentences.english: I have been told my car is a complete write-off , impossible to repair.
sentences.chinese: 我已經告訴你我的汽車已經報廢了，根本不可能修好。

sentences.english: Next day he comes by again, and she brags that she didn't dream of him.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，他又來了，她嘲笑根本沒有夢到他。

sentences.english: Kalec doesn't understand though. I've turn a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 卡雷克根本什麼都不懂，我已經有了新的目標了。

sentences.english: Without notes, I can hardly understand ancient Chinese prose.
sentences.chinese: 註解，我根本看不懂這些白文。

sentences.english: But scholars in the past neglected the foreign cultural factors when plot of a novel was conceived.
sentences.chinese: 而前賢忽視了這一有關構思根本的外來文化因子觸媒。

sentences.english: She clings to Monty to the point he doesn't have any time alone.
sentences.chinese: 她粘蒙提甚至到了根本不給他任何獨處的時間的程度。

sentences.english: During the growing season there is no time for socializing anyway.
sentences.chinese: 在作物生長季節，根本就沒工夫參加社交活動。

sentences.english: A noble professional virtue is in accord with the fundamental interests of the Party and the people.
sentences.chinese: 崇高的職業道德是與黨和人民的根本利益相一致的。

sentences.english: There is no conflict of fundamental interests among third world countries.
sentences.chinese: 第三世界國家之間沒有根本的利害衝突。

sentences.english: During his speech he pointed out the 3 root reasons for why Chinese are not good at communication.
sentences.chinese: 吳建民指出，“中國人不大會交流”有三個根本原因。

sentences.english: The only thing these interests he is cash.
sentences.chinese: 一個使他感興趣的事件根本那是多掙錢。

sentences.english: I stared at him in complete disbelief.
sentences.chinese: 我直盯盯地看着他，根本不相信。

definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
